ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 164
ygData.msgSnippet: Up to 16, as soon as I got the new pet spell, that first level I would often summon an even pet, sometimes even a yellow pet. With the 20th level spell, I have
ygData.messageBody:
Up to 16, as soon as I got the new pet spell, that first level I would often
summon an even pet, sometimes even a yellow pet. With the 20th level spell,
I have very rarely gotten even a 20th level pet. One that cons as 19th is
what I settle for. When I was with a higher level enchanter friend (27th),
she summoned a 21st level pet once with the 24th spell. This isn't really a
problem as I see it, especially in a dungeon, where charm is much more
powerful than using a pet.

Buca Vallon Zek
>
> > From: "Alex Kutsenok" <kutsenok@...>
> >
> > I am a new enchanter(lvl5) and I was wondering if its possible to
> sometimes
> > summon pets that are blue and sometimes black. If so, what are the
chances
> > of getting the better pet?
> >
